name: The Man From D.E.R.P.
description:
The Man From D.E.R.P. is a miniature adventure game for MS-DOS.

The game has these features:

Graphics similar to the old DOS games of the 1980s

A simplified text parser that accepts commands pertinent to the area you are in.

Developer's note: Due to how the game is programmed, it is important these two things are used for full enjoyment of the game

1) The game is played in DOSBox

2) All commands in-game are typed in all caps (Capslock must be on at all times).
